title: A City in the country: Albury Wodonga development
creator_credit: Jack Rogers, Anthony Buckley and Film Australia
brief_description: With forty-two percent of the Australia’s population in Sydney and Melbourne, there is a need for decentralization. Because of this, the government has acted to create a new growth area near the border of Victoria and New South Wales. This film studies the many factors involved in planning a new community.
